GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

POST /api/articles.description: posts a new article when given the correct body

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a single object of an article by article_id parameter

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles.description: posts a new article to the articles table

DELETE /api/articles/:article_id.description: deletes the given article not responding with any body

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of objects of comments from a article parameter

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a new comment to the comments table with the id of the parameter article

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the given articles votes number by the body given

GET /api/comments/:comment_id.description: serves a single object of a comment by comment_id parameter

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: updates the given comments votes number by the body given

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the given comment not responding with any body

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves a single object with the requested user
